tha-ap368:1.2_0: while walking along I wandered about,
tha-ap368:1.3_0: My goblins grief for a month,
tha-ap368:1.4_0: he is the mark of a Build;
tha-ap368:2.1_0: When you sat in a stilt longhouse,
tha-ap368:2.2_0: I saw the world speed upon the world.
tha-ap368:3.2_0: to see the word of the Buddha.
tha-ap368:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap368:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap368:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakkaṭa.
tha-ap368:6.1_0: The sixth section on the most senior monk with flowers.
